quotes.quote: Never tell a story because it is true: tell it because it is a good story.
If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
Stories can conquer fear, you know. They can make the heart bigger.
Whether this tale be true or false, none can tell, for none were there to witness it themselves.
A story should have a beginning, a middle and an end, but not necessarily in that order.
The basic quality that any great story must have is a story that illustrates the human condition.
News is the first draft of history.
Telling stories is not just a way of passing time. It is the way the wisdom gets passed along. The stuff that helps us to live a life worth remembering.
When you have a problem, if you tell the truth, the problem becomes part of your past. If you lie, it becomes part of your future.
When someone is mean to me, I just make them a victim in my next book.
What writer wants to make compromises with story? Story is the only reason you're in it.
When one side only of a story is heard and often repeated, the human mind becomes impressed with it insensibly.
The secret is to start a story near the ending.
The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can.
There is no doubt fiction makes a better job of the truth.
The story begins only when the book closes.
Life is too short for a long story.
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
Live your life as if you are writing your biography.
There is no real ending. It's just the place where you stop the story.
I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end.

Each of us has been designed for one of two immortal functions, as either a storyteller or as a cross-legged listener to tales of wonder, love, and daring. When we cease to tell or listen, then we no longer exist as a people.
The most important things to remember about back story are that (a) everyone has a history and (b) most of it isn't very interesting.
The best time to write a story is yesterday. The next best time is today.
Every great love starts with a great story.
A story can sing the truth and not just tell it.
We cannot think without language, we cannot process experience without story.
Stories make us more alive, more human, more courageous, more loving.
A story is how we construct our experiences.
In life, every ending is just the start of another story.
